description:
Perfect Strategy for:

  • Business Owners
  • Freelancers
  • Consultants
  • Non-Profits
  • Teachers
  • Real Estate Agents
  • Attorneys

Twitter takes a lot of time! How can we find time to do Twitter marketing, so that it is effective and focus on running a successful business?

The Mission Control 5 Minute Twitter Strategy takes the small business owner's time and need for ROI into account. We know that you and your staff most likely do not have the time it takes to manage a Twitter account effectively. Our 5 Minute Twitter Strategy course is what you need to produce a productive and winning strategy.

Twitter requires attention. Twitter requires engagement. Twitter requires time.

In this course, we will show you the platforms you need to simplify it all!

A good Twitter strategy is 80% sharing and 20% promotion. We will show you how to data mine for those 80% sharing Tweets and how to automate them.

We have removed the painstaking tasks and replaced them with simplified methods that make managing your Twitter marketing easier and more effective.

If you have never taken a course, had a Twitter strategy, or are looking for a more effective method... STOP LOOKING.

This method has helped our clients achieve:

  • Top 1% of all Twitter accounts
  • Top 5% of all Twitter accounts
  • Top 100 Twitter account in Los Angeles
  • Over 1 million monthly impressions
  • Over 100,000 monthly impressions
  • 1,000 - 50,000 monthly website visits

Our clients are not celebrities. They are small business owners and entrepreneurs.

This course puts all the work upfront, so that when you finish you are on your way to a successful 5 Minute Strategy.
title: 5 Minute Twitter Strategy for Small Business
